name: Gem River
description:
This is my first video game!  The game is endless and you collect coins to score points while avoiding the obstacles moving towards you.  All of the graphics were made by me, and all of the music (if you can call it that) was also made by me.   Every time you play, a random color is chosen for the background and obstacles.  Just try to get the highest score possible and tell me what you think of it.

Side Note: I'm not sure why, but to start the game you need to click outside of the frame first

Controls: arrow keys to move
